descriptionHtml:
Hey guys,

You can find the Bronze Greatsword in the Steel Smithing Category.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

REQUIREMENTS:
* Steel Smithing /
* Steel Ingot /
* Corundum Ingot /
* Leather Strips /
* Ale (Because everyone needs a drink after a hard day\'s blacksmithing)

***------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------***
FEATURES: V1.0 (Comparison: Vanilla Steel Waraxe Stats)
* Weight:    14% heavier
* Attack:     22% stronger
* Crit:         0% better
* Speed:      6% faster
author: Elgar2389
